responses: Happy to ask, I'm looking for an end of studies internship of 4 to 6 months starting February 2022

I'm a Second year student of a master's degree in Data Science and Decision Support at the Faculty of Sciences and Technologies, in Morocco. I graduated in distributed computer systems after I'd had my baccalaureate in 2017. I am passionate about computer science.

MY TECHNICAL SKILLS --- ***** --- *** Programming Languages *** : PYTHON, R, JAVA, C, JAVASCRIPT, PHP. *** Data Science Skills *** : Machine Learning, Deep learning, Artificial Intelligence, Data Manipulation, DataVisualization, Business Intelligence, Data mining, Web scraping, *** Machine Learning and Deep Learning *** : Tensorflow, sklearn, NLP, ** models ** : SVM, KNN, Decesion Tree, Random Forest, K-means, PCA, RNN, CNN... *** Data processing *** : numpy, pandas. *** Data visualization *** : matplotlib, tableau. *** Web Development *** : Spring Boot, Angular, Laravel, Mysql, Nosql.
I'm from morocco and I live in Marrakech

YOU CAN CONTACT ME VIA --- ***** --- ** email ** : bartyouger@gmail.com, ** TEL ** : +212699816258, ** LinkedIn ** : bartaouch khalid, ** github ** : bart-khalid, ** portfolio ** : https://bartaouch-khalid.me

patterns: what are the projects you worked in ?
responses: MY PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCES --- ***** --- *** Full-stack Developer (end of studies internship) at University Cadi Ayyad (04/2020 - 08/2020) *** : In this period, I developed a responsive web application for maintenance management, using Spring boot to create a Rest API and Angular 8 for the front-end part, I deployed this app in a free domain as well as a free hosting, which are offered by Herokuapp, Link to the app : https://entretienfst.herokuapp.com

patterns: what are the projects you worked in ?
responses: MY ACADEMIC PROJECTS --- ***** --- *** Chatbot application (05/2021 - 06/2021) *** : We were a team of three, we built a chatbot application designed to answer any question about machine learning mainly, and also to assist a user in simple every day questions, like historical or famous people and places, or entertain him with jokes or play him a song, link to the app : https://github.com/bart-khalid/chatBot  .  *** Sentiment Detector, face recognition and chatbot (04/2021 - 06/2021) *** : we have created a Chatbot that interacts with the identified person based on his detected feeling, link to the app : https://github.com/bart-khalid/RFASC .

Being a data scientist was the goal I set my eyes on since my first years at the faculty. During my studies, I was passionate about everything that is related with computer science, and after obtaining my bachelor's degree, I decided to become a data scientist, because nowadays, this field constitutes a real wealth for companies, around which gravitate some fundamental stakes of knowledge extraction from raw data, and then its exploitation in decision making. During my studies, I was able to acquire essential knowledge in data extraction, data manipulation and data visualization. A direct application of different techniques of artificial intelligence, data mining, machine learning, deep learning, and business intelligence as well as web development. Through several projects, I was able to see things on the professional field and put into practice all my skills and my technical knowledge acquired during my university career.

I think one of my greatest strengths is a problem solver. I have the ability to see a situation from different perspectives and I can get my work done even in the face of difficult obstacles. I have the ability to work under pressure and I'm very Team-oriented, I love collaborating with other people.
